title: OWB-1300 - test and fix for ClassCastException in org.apache.webbeans…
OWB-1291: Add refactored Tomcat module
Not everyone runs on a beefy machine, allow up to 30 seconds for the jetty distro to start up
body: I suspect not everyone gets to run on something like: The default timeout for the `jetty:run-distro` goal is 1 second. On my work mac this only failed once out of 100 times. However I could get a more slow behaviour when running in a docker image For reference, here's how I used a docker image to get the failure more often: ``` $ docker run -ti --rm --mount "type=bind,source=${HOME}/.m2,target=/home/user/.m2" --mount "type=bind,source=$(pwd),target=/home/user/src" -u 1000 stephenc/docker-git-java8-maven-vim bash user@345631480ede:~$ cd src/webbeans-jetty9 user@345631480ede:~$ mvn verify -P+run-its ```

title: [OWB-1285] Implements a Jetty 9 Plugin
body:
Only works for embedded and Jetty module use cases with Jetty 9.4.x where x <= 12 due to the regression introduced in Jetty 9.4.13 https://github.com/eclipse/jetty.project/issues/3597

Works against latest Jetty 9.4.x if OWB and this plugin is included in the WAR
